segments.text: I went to Rotes ’ , you know , Edith Roth is the author of a book about moths .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is she ? I thought she was a mathematician .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you ? I thought you had something to drink at her home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Edith didn ’ t give anything to drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll buy you a drink .
segments.speaker: S2
